api/AiWorldGeneration.TCP.ClientControll.keywords: Class ClientController Controls a TCP client connection. Declaration public Task<string> CreateNewSkybox(string prompt, bool reportCompletion = false, int taskId = -1, bool quick = true) Parameters Type Name Description string prompt The prompt skybox prompt. bool reportCompletion A value indicating whether to report the completion status of the task. int taskId An optional unique identifier for the task. Default is -1. bool quick Stop the generation at the first pipeline element. Returns Type Description Task<><string> The path to the generated skybox (image), or the error message. CreateNewSkyboxLocal(string, bool, int) Take a text prompt and asks the server to generate a new skybox. Declaration public Task<string> CreateNewSkyboxLocal(string prompt, bool reportCompletion = false, int taskId = -1) Parameters Type Name Description string prompt The prompt skybox prompt. bool reportCompletion A value indicating whether to report the completion status of the task. int taskId An optional unique identifier for the task. Default is -1. Returns Type Description Task<><string> The path to the generated skybox (image), or the error message. ExtendSkybox(byte[], int, bool) Extend the input skybox to triple its heights. Declaration public Task<string> ExtendSkybox(byte[] imageBytes, int taskId = -1, bool reportCompletion = false) Parameters Type Name Description byte[] imageBytes The image to be extend, bytes in PNG format. int taskId Id to track this task, any unique number. bool reportCompletion A value indicating whether to report the completion status of the task. Returns Type Description Task<><string> The path to the extended image. GetCompletionStatus(int) Retrieves the completion status of a task with the given task ID. Declaration public float GetCompletionStatus(int taskId) Parameters Type Name Description int taskId The ID of the task to retrieve the completion status for. Returns Type Description float The completion status of the task. Inpaint(byte[], byte[], string, int, bool) Inpaints an image using its mask and a prompt, without saving files locally. Sends image and mask bytes along with a prompt to the server for inpainting, saves the inpainted image bytes and returns its path. Declaration public Task<string> Inpaint(byte[] imageBytes, byte[] maskBytes, string query, int taskId = -1, bool reportCompletion = false) Parameters Type Name Description byte[] imageBytes The image to be inpainted, bytes in PNG format. byte[] maskBytes The bytes composing the mask. string query The prompt for the inpainting process. int taskId Id to track this task, any unique number. bool reportCompletion A value indicating whether to report the completion status of the task. Returns Type Description Task<><string> The path to the inpainted image. InpaintLocal(byte[], byte[], string, int, bool) Inpaints an image using its mask and a prompt. Sends image and mask paths along with a prompt to the server for inpainting and returns the inpainted image path. Declaration public Task<string> InpaintLocal(byte[] imageBytes, byte[] maskBytes, string query, int taskId = -1, bool reportCompletion = false) Parameters Type Name Description byte[] imageBytes The image to be inpainted, bytes in PNG format. byte[] maskBytes The bytes composing the mask. string query The prompt for the inpainting process. int taskId Id to track this task, any unique number. bool reportCompletion A value indicating whether to report the completion status of the task. Returns Type Description Task<><string> The path to the inpainted image. RefineSkybox(byte[], string, int, bool) Refine a skybox to increase its quality. Declaration public Task<string> RefineSkybox(byte[] imageBytes, string query, int taskId = -1, bool reportCompletion = false) Parameters Type Name Description byte[] imageBytes The image to be inpainted, bytes in PNG format. string query The prompt for the inpainting process. int taskId Id to track this task, any unique number. bool reportCompletion A value indicating whether to report the completion status of the task. Returns Type Description Task<><string> The path to the inpainted image. RemoveSkyboxSeam(byte[], int, bool) Remove the seam line at the borders of a skybox making it an asymetric tiling. Declaration public Task<string> RemoveSkyboxSeam(byte[] imageBytes, int taskId = -1, bool reportCompletion = false) Parameters Type Name Description byte[] imageBytes The image to be inpainted, bytes in PNG format. int taskId Id to track this task, any unique number. bool reportCompletion A value indicating whether to report the completion status of the task. Returns Type Description Task<><string> The path to the inpainted image. SendPing() Sends a ping request to the server and returns the response time in milliseconds. Declaration public Task<int> SendPing() Returns Type Description Task<><int> The response time in milliseconds. TextFromAudio(byte[]) Sends an audio file as bytes to the server for text conversion and returns the transcribed text. Declaration public Task<string> TextFromAudio(byte[] audioBytes) Parameters Type Name Description byte[] audioBytes The bytes of the audio file path to be transcribed. Returns Type Description Task<><string> The transcribed text from the audio file. TextFromAudio(string) Sends an audio file path to the server for text conversion and returns the transcribed text. Declaration public Task<string> TextFromAudio(string audioPath) Parameters Type Name Description string audioPath The path to the audio file path to be transcribed. Returns Type Description Task<><string> The transcribed text from the audio file.

api/AiWorldGeneration.TCP.html.title: Namespace AiWorldGeneration.TCP | AIWorldGeneration VR
api/AiWorldGeneration.TCP.html.keywords: Namespace AiWorldGeneration.TCP Transport layer protocol implementation and shenanigans. Classes AsrQuery A query for Automatic Speech Recognition. AsrResponse Response data for Automatic Speech Recognition on a single computer. BaseClientQuery A client query to send data to the server serializable as JSON. ClientController Controls a TCP client connection. ClientWorker A client tasking waiting for a server answer. CompletionQuery Ask the server to report the progress of a task. CompletionResponse Completion rate for a task. ExtendSkyboxQuery Query to extend a skybox. ImageEditionQuery Abstract query to do an image edition task. ImageResponse Rsponse data for skybox generation with the image encoded inside. InpaintingQuery Query to do an inpainting task. JsonInterface C# interface with the JSON configuration file. This file is usually stored at Assets/Configurations/api.json LocalAsrQuery A query for Automatic Speech Recognition using a local file. LocalImageResponse Rsponse data for skybox generation on a single computer. LocalInpaintingQuery Query to do an inpainting task on a single computer. LocalInpaintingResponse Response data for inpainting on a single computer. LocalNewSkyboxQuery Query to generate a new skybox on the same device. NetworkCommunicator NewSkyboxQuery Query to generate a new skybox as a sequence of bytes. PingQuery A ping query to measure the status of the server and the response time. PingResponse Response to a ping. RefineSkyboxQuery Query to do an skybox refining task. RemoveSeamQuery Query to do remove the seam line from a skybox. SerializableResponse Basic format that the server should follow. SerializableResponseData Base property for the server response data. ServerInterface Interface to fetch configuration data from the server file.

Returns Type Description EditionMode Returns the corresponding edition mode based on the current UI mode and input parameters. GetEditionMode(int) Retrieves the edition mode based on the selected dropdown value. Declaration public EditionMode GetEditionMode(int value) Parameters Type Name Description int value The index of the selected option in the edition mode dropdown. Returns Type Description EditionMode The corresponding edition mode based on the selected dropdown value. If the selected option is "skybox creation", returns EditionMode.BASIC. If the selected option is "skybox edition", returns EditionMode.PAINTING. If the selected option is "expert mode", returns EditionMode.EXPERT. Throws an InvalidOperationException if the selected dropdown value does not match any of the expected options. GetInpaintingPrompt() Retrieves the prompt for the inpainting task based on the current UI mode. Declaration public string GetInpaintingPrompt() Returns Type Description string The text prompt for the inpainting task. GetPrompt() Retrieves the current text prompt from the input field. Declaration public bool IsModeExpert() Returns Type Description bool Returns true if expert mode is enabled, false otherwise. In compact mode, it checks the selected dropdown option to determine expert mode. In non-compact mode, it uses the toggle state of the expert mode toggle. SetActiveButtons(int) Sets the visibility of the skybox buttons based on the current phase. Declaration public void SetActiveButtons(int skyboxPhase) Parameters Type Name Description int skyboxPhase The current phase of the skybox creation process. The function will activate the button corresponding to the current phase and deactivate all other buttons. SetAudioAnalyse() Sets the UI to indicate that audio analysis is in progress. Declaration public void SetAudioAnalyse() Remarks This method changes the text on the recording button to "Analysing..." and disables the button. It is called when the audio analysis process starts. SetEditionMode(int) Sets the edition mode of the UI based on the selected dropdown value. Declaration public void SetEditionMode(int newValue) Parameters Type Name Description int newValue The new value to set for the edition mode dropdown. This value corresponds to the index of the selected option in the dropdown. Remarks This function updates the value of the edition mode dropdown and triggers the onValueChanged event of the dropdown to reflect the change in the UI. SetGenerationChange(bool) Updates the UI elements related to the generation process. Declaration public void SetGenerationChange(bool generationStarting) Parameters Type Name Description bool generationStarting A boolean indicating whether the generation process is starting or not. If true, the progress bar will be activated and the submit button will be disabled. If false, the progress bar will be deactivated and the submit button will be enabled. SetInputFieldText(string, bool) Sets the text of the input field based on the provided input and the current UI mode. Declaration public void SetInputFieldText(string input, bool inpaintingMode) Parameters Type Name Description string input The text to be set in the input field. bool inpaintingMode A boolean indicating whether the UI is in inpainting mode or not. If true, the text is set in the inpainting input field. If false, the text is set in the regular input field. Remarks This function also resets the recording button text to "Start Recording" and enables the recording button. SetProgressBar(float) Update the progress bar. Declaration public void SetProgressBar(float value) Parameters Type Name Description float value SetRecordingButtonText(string) Sets the text of the recording button to the provided message. Declaration public void SetRecordingButtonText(string message) Parameters Type Name Description string message The text to be displayed on the recording button. Remarks This method is used to update the text on the recording button to indicate the current state of the audio recording process.

index.html.title: VR Environment creation by Generative AI, Unity client | AIWorldGeneration VR
index.html.keywords: VR Environment creation by Generative AI, Unity client This Unity project is a client for generating, modifying and exploring environments generated by AI from voice prompts. It features two main scenes, one for desktop and one for virtual reality, that both let you explore new worlds. The idea of this project is to let you access all the AI features from an application, reducing the interruptions in the creation process. Short complete demo.webm The project was developed at the Fondation Campus Biotech Geneva (GitHub), in collaboration with the Laboratory of Cognitive Science (part of EPLF). Installation The installation is simple, as we use standard Unity features. Here is the detailed guide. Download Unity Editor 2022.3.36+. Open the project and you should be able to use scenes, without the AI features. Most VR headsets compatible with OpenXR should work out of the box. The project was developed with the HP Reverb G2 (a Windows Mixed Reality Headset). If the XR assets do not work, you can try to reinstall them from the Package Manager (Package manager -> XR Interaction Toolkit -> Samples -> Starter Assets -> Reimport). For Windows Mixed Reality Headsets, you may also try to reimport the plugins. Important This is only the client, you need a running server to actually use the AI features! The repository to run the server can be found at: VR-Environment-GenAI-Server. Usage This Unity project features a scene generated by an AI from a text prompt. The scene is dynamically created based on the input text and allows for unique and creative environments to be generated. To generate a scene: Start the Python server, and edit the configuration if necessary. Load the desired scene. On desktop load the "Desktop Creator" scene, and the "VR Creator" scene in VR. Enter a text prompt in the input field. In VR you can speak while holding the microphone. Press the "Generate" button. Watch as the AI creates a scene based on your text prompt. A progress bar indicates the remaining time. Configuration You may need to set a few configuration parameters for a smooth experience. Most configuration parameters are under Assets/Configurations/api.json. In case you are running the project locally VR and AI on the same computer (the "debug" configuration), you should set the following. pythonFallbackApiFile: file path to the Python api.json file, this file should be in the root folder of the Python project. If you want to connect to a remote server, the important features to set: serverDefaultIp: the IP to reach the AI server (IPv4 preferred). serverDefaultPort: server default port number. Note: if both the server and the fallback api file are correctly specified, the server will be ignored and the connection will be local. You can replace the fallback api file path by any wrong path to prevent this behavior. Some options are considered legacy and where used for communication on the same file storage. You can specify where Python should save the files, temporary locations are better. audioPath: the path to the temporary audio file to save when using the speech-to-text feature. baseImage: the path to the texture that will be modified. maskPath: the path to the temporary mask texture that is used during the inpainting feature. Features The main features of this project are: Text-to-Skybox generation. Speech-to-text: speak naturally. Mask drawing and inpainting: freely select and redraw elements. Scenes All the following scenes are in the Assets/Scenes folder. "Desktop Creator" - Main scene for skybox creation in desktop mode. "VR Creator" - Skybox creation with a VR headset. You can also use it when no headset is plugged in, but this is much of a debug feature. The other scenes are for testing pruposes: "Speech Recognition" - A simple scene that only integrates speech-to-text. "Experiments Scene" - A scene containing various legacy experiments. Documentation We provide an online documentation, you can also access it in the documentation branch, under docs/. The documentation is generated with DocFX, you can regenerate it with DocFX. cp README.md Documentation/index.md # Option 1: Offline, static documentation docfx Documentation/docfx.json -t statictoc,custom_template # Option 2: on a web server docfx Documentation/docfx.json Both commands will generate a documentation under docs/. Legacy features Skybox Import This project allows for the import of custom skyboxes. The skybox is automatically imported into the scene when the player hits enter. Launch the scene: Maintain left click to start drawing. Use the scroll wheel to change the radius of the drawing area. Use right click to save the mask. It is saved in "Assets/Temp/mask.png" by default. Breathing Experiment for Meditation As a small bonus feature, this project includes a small breathing experiment for meditation. To start the breathing experiment: Enable the breathing asset. Press the space bar on in-breathing and release on out-breath. Links You can find the project at the following locations. Official public repository: https://github.com/fcbg-hnp-vr/VR-Environment-GenAI-Unity Active public repository: https://github.com/HugoFara/VR-Environment-GenAI-Unity Original private repository: https://gitlab.com/fcbg-hnp-vr/2024/interne/ai-world-generation/vr-viewer For the official public AI server: https://github.com/fcbg-hnp-vr/VR-Environment-GenAI-Server.
